body_html:
OK, looking at -T 1 logs it looks like the decoder weights (PyTorch) / softmax weights (TensorFlow) diverge immediately on the first iteration. At least, I'm pretty sure that's the correspondence (that's the einsum in TensorFlow.) Do you see that as well?

EDIT: Nope, they're just transposed.

body:
OK, looking at `-T 1` logs it looks like the decoder weights (PyTorch) / softmax weights (TensorFlow) diverge immediately on the first iteration. At least, I'm pretty sure that's the correspondence (that's the `einsum` in TensorFlow.) Do you see that as well?

EDIT: Nope, they're just transposed.
